data.name: Chill Corner - Live Wallpaper & Custom Music
data.detailed_description:
This DLC added two new feature for the game:
- Custom music: allow you to add your external music file to play in the game
- Live wallpaper: allow you to set your room as dynamic desktop wallpaper
data.about_the_game:
This DLC added two new feature for the game:
- Custom music: allow you to add your external music file to play in the game
- Live wallpaper: allow you to set your room as dynamic desktop wallpaper
data.short_description: This DLC added two new feature for the game: - Custom music: allow you to add your external music file to play in the game - Live wallpaper: allow you to set your room as dynamic desktop wallpaper
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
